title: IUSF organizes ‘New Year tables for the struggle’
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Inter-University Students Federation (IUSF) today staged several protests and sit-ins under the theme of not alienating the protestors at Galle Face and taking their fight forward.
The students, who were engaged in a Satyagrama near the Karapitiya Teaching Hospital, had organized an ‘Avurudu sweetmeats table’ called the New Year’s Table of Struggle.
IUSF members also prepared a New Year table themed ‘for the struggle’ near the Kandy Clock Tower and entertained people as well.

In Elpitiya, the Inter University Student Federation (IUSF) was engaged in a satyagraha while a New Year table was organized in Kiribathgoda with the intervention of the Kelaniya University Students’ Union.
